servinfo.title: Air intake Pipe Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Intercooler and Air Intake Pipe Components:For F9Q Engine

s1.ptxt: Disconnect boost presser sensor connector (1) and intake throttle valve connector (2).
Disconnect intercooler outlet pipe (3) from air intake pipe (5) after removing intercooler outlet pipe clamp (6).
Remove vacuum pipe (4) and air intake pipe.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten air intake pipe bolt and nut to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Air intake pipe bolt and nut

item.ptxt: Tighten intercooler outlet pipe clamp to specified torque as follows.
Tighten intercooler outlet pipe clamp to 5 N·m (0.5 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft).
Retighten intercooler outlet pipe clamp to 5 N·m (0.5 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft).

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 5 N·m (0.5 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft) and 5 N·m (0.5 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft) after 5 minutes
